task: Develop a basic 'Dominoes' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Go slowly all the way round the outside'.
name: Perimeter Path: Domino Drift

branding_data.short_description: A strategic twist on classic dominoes with a focus on perimeter play.
branding_data.detailed_description: Perimeter Path: Domino Drift is a unique adaptation of the traditional dominoes game where players are encouraged to strategically place their tiles along the edges of the play area. Inspired by the oblique strategy 'Go slowly all the way round the outside,' this game emphasizes careful, perimeter-focused gameplay. Players must think ahead and plan their moves to control the outer boundaries, creating a new layer of tactical depth to the classic tile-matching challenge.

strategy: Go slowly all the way round the outside
